info.name: Job Search Platform API
info.description:
Complete API collection for the Job Search Platform. Contains 55 endpoints organized by domain.

**Base URL**: http://localhost:8000/api

**Authentication**: Laravel Sanctum (Bearer Token)

request.description: Check API health status and database connection.
Register a new user. Required: full_name, email, password (min 8 chars with letters+numbers), password_confirmation, phone, role (JobSeeker/Employer).
Login with email and password. Token is automatically saved.
Get authenticated user's data with profile.
Request password reset code. Sends 6-digit code to email (valid for 60 minutes).
Reset password with 6-digit code. Password must be 8+ chars with letters and numbers.
Send account verification code to email (valid for 60 minutes).
Verify account with 6-digit code. Activates user account.
Change password for authenticated user. Requires current password.
Set role for users who registered without a role. Used in two-step registration flow.
Get current user's profile (JobSeeker or Company).
Create or update job seeker profile.

body.raw:
{
    "company_name": "Tech Solutions",
    "organization_name": "Tech Solutions LLC",
    "address": "Sana'a, Yemen",
    "description": "Leading technology company...",
    "logo_path": "/logos/tech.png",
    "website_url": "https://techsolutions.com",
    "established_year": 2015,
    "employee_count": 50,
    "field_of_work": "Information Technology"
}

request.description: Mark a specific notification as read.
Get all CVs for current user.
Get CV with all related data (skills, education, experience, languages).

body.raw:
{
    "job_title": "Senior Developer",
    "company_name": "Tech Corp",
    "start_date": "2018-01-01",
    "end_date": "2023-12-31",
    "responsibilities": "Leading development team, code reviews, architecture design..."
}

request.description: Search and filter jobs. All parameters are optional.
Get job details with company and skills.

body.raw:
{
    "title": "Full Stack Developer",
    "description": "We are looking for an experienced full stack developer...",
    "responsibilities": "- Design and develop web applications\n- Work with team members\n- Code reviews",
    "requirements": "- 3+ years experience\n- Laravel, React\n- English proficiency",
    "location": "Sana'a, Yemen",
    "workplace_type": "Remote",
    "work_type": "full_time",
    "salary_min": 500,
    "salary_max": 1500,
    "currency": "USD",
    "skills": [
        {
            "skill_id": 1,
            "required_level": "Advanced",
            "is_mandatory": true
        },
        {
            "skill_id": 2,
            "required_level": "Intermediate",
            "is_mandatory": false
        }
    ]
}

request.description: Create a new job listing (created as Draft).
Publish a job (change status to Active).
Close a job (change status to Closed).
Get applications for a specific job.
Update application status. Status options: Pending, Reviewed, Shortlisted, Interviewing, Offered, Hired, Rejected
Get company details with job listings.
Enroll in a course (job seekers only).
Send a message in a conversation.
Get all skills. Optional filters: category_id, search.
Get skill categories with skills count.
Get all users with search and filter options.
Get system statistics: total users, job seekers, employers, blocked, etc.
Get detailed information about a specific user.
Create a new user as admin.
Get all courses for current employer.

body.raw:
{
    "title": "Laravel Advanced Course",
    "topics": "API, Testing, Security, Performance",
    "duration": "40 hours",
    "location": "Online",
    "trainer": "Dr. Ahmed Mohammed",
    "fees": 150.00,
    "start_date": "2024-03-01",
    "status": "Draft"
}

request.description: Publish a course (change status to Active).
Get all enrollments for a course.
Send notification to all enrolled participants. Types: reminder, update, cancellation, info.
